title: Storefront: display product-record images for Brown leather Luxury Watch (no frontend overrides)

requirements.summary: Ensure catalog cards and product details gallery render the backend-provided product.images for "Brown leather Luxury Watch For Unisex Rs. 19" with robust image-load fallback and no frontend special-casing that swaps in auto-generated square images.
acceptanceCriteria: For the product named exactly "Brown leather Luxury Watch For Unisex Rs. 19", the catalog card image and product details gallery images are sourced from `product.images` returned by the backend and match the corrected `images` array.
There is no frontend special-casing that substitutes auto-generated square images for this product.
If any of the product-record images fail to load, the UI falls back to `/assets/generated/watch-placeholder.dim_800x800.png` (no broken-image icon shown).

file_operations.description: Ensure image normalization utilities do not introduce any special-casing for "Brown leather Luxury Watch For Unisex Rs. 19" (i.e., always return normalized `images` from the product record for this product) and keep the placeholder fallback path `/assets/generated/watch-placeholder.dim_800x800.png` as the default when `images` is empty.

Harden gallery rendering to safely handle empty/invalid `images` arrays by always rendering at least one image and ensuring `onError` swaps the failed image to `/assets/generated/watch-placeholder.dim_800x800.png` (including single-image mode and thumbnails) to avoid broken-image icons.

Confirm catalog card images remain sourced from `product.images` (no product-name-based overrides for the Brown leather product) and ensure the existing `onError` fallback reliably swaps to `/assets/generated/watch-placeholder.dim_800x800.png` without leaving a broken-image icon.
